newsitem.title: USA: Multiple Zones sees price pressure on Q4.
newsitem.headline: Multiple Zones sees price pressure on Q4.

text.p: Multiple Zones International Inc said gross margin volatility in the Apple Computer Inc Apple/Macintosh market and overall price compression, particularly in microcomputer hardware, will impact its ability to meet analysts' expectations.
"The company anticipates favorable absolute growth from the prior year fourth quarter and the sequential third quarter in ways consistent with our company's strategy.
"We continue with our objectives of focusing on the PC/Wintel market and expanding our outbound sales efforts to business accounts," chief executive officer Victor Melfi said.
